subject: Biology
question_text: Brown bread, made from the flour of whole wheat grains, contains both starch and fibre.

difficulty.justification: Requires understanding of digestive processes and interpretation of data

sub_questions.text: Describe where and how starch digestion takes place in the digestive system
Describe what happens to fibre as it passes through the digestive system
Give two ways in which active transport is different from diffusion
Questions about blood glucose concentration graph
Describe two methods scientists could use to produce wheat with increased fiber content

images.label: Fig. 2.1
images.description: Graph showing blood glucose concentration over time for different types of starch
